description: Listed only by Maclean, who says: �Name sometimes given to the Swell 16 ft. Gedeckt or Lieblich Bourdon, when borrowed on the Pedal division.�
examplesDescription: Osiris contains eighteen examples, all of which are 16' stops in pedal divisions of 20th century German organs. Several are borrowed from other divisions. Several use the same pipes as a 16' Subbass, but on reduced wind pressure.
